snippet: It previews the design and performance characteristics of Acura’s coming midsize performance luxury sedan, which will replace the aging TL and TSX.
lead_paragraph: It previews the design and performance characteristics of Acura’s coming midsize performance luxury sedan, which will replace the aging TL and TSX.

headline.main: Prototype Sets Stage for New TLX
